summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906. The subpoena is dated July 13, 2021, and signed by the United States Attorney and an Assistant United States Attorney.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (MN)), for which the subpoena is issued to compel testimony.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed and issued the subpoena.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands the recipient to appear before the United States District Court to testify and give evidence in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York, Southern District of New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 13, 2021, for an individual to testify in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330 (MN)).
The subpoena commands the recipient's personal appearance on November 29, 2021, at 9:00 a.m. at 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906.
Failure to comply with the subpoena constitutes contempt of court and subjects the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
The subpoena is signed by United States Attorney Audrey Strauss, indicating active prosecution by the Southern District of New York.
